ui_garage_title: List of all AVs and selected types
ui_free_summon_warning_message_in_summon: The settings menu is currently unavailable.
Please despawn your AV by pushing vehicle button.
Please check the "Enable Free Summon" checkbox.
ui_free_summon_select_model_explain: Select the AV you want to drive
ui_control_setting_explain_spinner: Spinner: Operates like the spinner in Blade Runner. It can fly ignoring gravity.
ui_control_setting_explain_Heli: Helicopter: Operates like a helicopter. It can fly while feeling gravity.
ui_control_setting_disable_left_right: Disable the tilt to the left and right
ui_control_setting_disable_forward_backw: Disable the tilt to the forward and backward
ui_environment_enable_community_spawn: Enable Crowd and Vehicles Spawn in Flight
ui_environment_spawn_frequency: Spawn Frequency (Number of spawns per second)
ui_environment_warning_message_about_com: Enabling this feature may cause screen stuttering.
ui_environment_warning_message_about_spa: The higher the spawn frequency, the more likely it is to cause screen stuttering.
ui_setting_reset_setting: Reset all settings to their default state
